question: what are the admission requirements
answer:
For undergraduate admission to Ramachandra College of Engineering, we look for students with:
• Minimum GPA of 4.0 (average)
• SAT score around 1320 or ACT score around 29 (average)
• Strong personal statement
• Extracurricular activities
• Letters of recommendation

Our acceptance rate is 68%.

question: can you give an overview of the college
answer:
Ramachandra College of Engineering is a comprehensive university founded in 2007 located in Eluru, Andhra Pradesh, India.

Our motto is "Illuminating Paths to Knowledge." We have approximately 15000 students (12000 undergraduate and 3000 graduate) and 50 faculty members, creating a student-to-faculty ratio of 60:1.

Our beautiful campus spans 10 acres and is accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA), All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).
